Context:
In case of a medical emergency on campus, students, faculty, and staff are advised to contact Campus Security at 416-415-4000 or "0" from any George Brown College internal Cisco phone. An alternate method is using the Yellow Emergency Call boxes throughout the buildings. Campus Security and First Aid teams communicate through two-way radio, ensuring both teams are dispatched to the call.

Important contact numbers:
- Campus Security: 416-415-4000 or "0" from any George Brown College internal Cisco phone
- TTY: 1-877-515-5559
- ask.george@georgebrown.ca

Additional resources and contacts:
- Sign Up for college news, application deadlines, upcoming events, tours, and more at [Sign Up Now](http://sign_up_now_url)
- Social Media Hub: Visit Our Social Media Hub (two occurrences in the text)
- Information contained in this website is subject to change without notice
- Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
